name: Retro Warp
description:
Warp back in the good ol' decades to find your way to nostalgic retro items in this small puzzle game.

You are in a maze-like place and your role is to find the amount of certain item displayed at the bottom of the screen. The classic items around the map are used to warp you between two connected decades. There are total of 3 decades you can warp to: 1970's, 1980's, and 1990's, warp to other time period when your path is blocked.

Controls:
Arrow keys to Move.
R to Restart level.
E to Exit level.
S to open Settings.
(You can also enable visual buttons in settings)
